description: n*bigomega(n)^n, where bigomega(n) is the number of repeated prime divisors of n.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,200
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,20,print(n*bigomega(n)^n))(PARI) { for (n=1, 200, write("b061452.txt", n, " ", n*bigomega(n)^n)) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 15 2001
extensions: Terms corrected by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009
